#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
long long int a[1111];
class rec { public:int min,max,value; };
rec recursion(int i,int j)
{
    if(i == j)
    {
        rec result;
        result.min = result.max = a[i];
        result.value = INT_MIN;
        return result;
    }
    int mid = (i+j)/2;
    rec result1 = recursion(i,mid);
    rec result2 = recursion(mid+1,j);
    rec result;
    result.value = max(result1.value,result2.value);
    result.value = max(result.value,result2.min-result1.min);
    result.value = max(result.value,result2.max-result1.max);
    result.value = max(result.value,result2.min-result1.max);
    result.value = max(result.value,result2.max-result1.min);
    result.min = min(result1.min,result2.min);
    result.max = max(result1.max,result2.max);
    return result;
    
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            cin>>a[i];
        rec result = recursion(0,n-1);
        cout<< result.value <<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
